ygData.subject: Re: Evil Eye Runes for Crafted
ygData.msgSnippet: I wish I knew where the third is off of. Aren t they just random drops? I have killed Borxx at least 15 times (I keep going back to help my friends get thier
ygData.messageBody:
I wish I knew where the third is off of. Aren't they just random drops? I
have killed Borxx at least 15 times (I keep going back to help my friends
get thier Observer Staff), and I've never seen or heard anyone get that rune
off of Borxxy.

Sorry =(

Lanadina


----Original Message Follows----
From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Subject: [EQCheats] Evil Eye Runes for Crafted
Date: Tue, 14 Sep 1999 11:47:55 -0500

From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>

Anyone actually done this part? I heard somewhere that two runes are off
normal EEs, and the 3rd is off Borxx. And, we killed him twice last night
and no Rune of the dwarves or whatever... *sigh*
